post_text: Dear Singtel, your internet service is slow as hell. I can't even load a google search page. Stop throttling the internet.
I have been waiting for 3 day no one can handle my Singtel TV problems. The staff who tell me to sign up a new contract is giving me the wrong information. Just don't understand how this can happen.

What wrong??
Singtel

Hi Singtel, this is very disappointing. I tried to pre-order the new Samsung Galaxy S10+ on 23 Feb, Sat but was unable to self serve online since my contract is now under CIS and I would like to recontract as a normal user. Your CSO took my particulars and promised to arrange for a call in the next 1-2 working days.
Jacqueline from causewaypoint provide good service and ans my question promptly üëç
Great service by Linda Soh at Singtel Waterway Point! She‚Äôs very helpful in advising us which phone to get for my dad. Thank you!

Guan Hong at waterway point did a wonderful presentation of explaining all the possible and affordable plans for me. He went to the extend of drafting out different options for me to choose. Most friendly, helpful and patient singtel staff I had met Thank you and keep up the good work!!

Dear Singtel customer service, if you still ever exist, I hope you really would pay good attention to this message. I have lodged complaints a few times regarding harassment of overseas robotic spam calls received over a period of few weeks non-stop every day but nothing had been done on your end. As a telco and a giant one, I am amazed at your customer service and support. If you call your own service 1688, you would be transferred to see if you want to access digital Helpde...
Syna@Waterway Point serve me very nice and patient. The guy beside her - Alex is nice too.

data usage has suddenly increased by a tremendous amount (3-4 times the normal)
This is happening to my mum's hp line.
Guan hong was very helpful and quick to provide us service. He provided us very useful information and was wonderful.

When I told your customer "service" genius that I moved house and hence I did not see physical letters about forgotten payment for that single month and that I have never missed in last 4 years ... the genius claimed that since I have ebill and SMS I should be ok and hence physical letter charge of 5 bucks stands.
Good service provided by Aalex Jong :)

Great customer experience from Aalex Jong @waterway point...he is originally from causeway point..

Today i went to Waterway Point served by Aalex Jong(originally from Causeway Point) indeed I was very delighted with service he rendered to me very professional. He was very thoughtful in explaining in details of my plan and helping me intern of saving. I have only one word to describe him very initiative and setting a role model for Singtel
I was served by Novi Wong at the causeway point retail shop. She was very helpful polite and friendly. She is kind enough to explain the plans clearly. Thank you so much for the kind services

Dear Singtel, I understand that it was my hindsight that I overlooked on the bill payment. But this letter sent to me defeats its purpose. Firstly, the date of the letter and the payment cutoff date are both on the same day. Secondly, I only receive this letter on 27 Feb, way past the cutoff date. So no matter what, I have already incurred the late payment fee.
Josh from Comcentre has been really helpful to help me compare singtel plans to get the best value for my phone purchase
Hi Singtel , does this mean I have the bundle??
Alvin loh at causeway point was friendly and had help me save money on my monthly plan.

Singtel please ask ur customer service to wakeup and if not smart, dont act smart
